title: His responsibility?
brief_description: Ronnie aged 18, learns that his girlfriend is pregnant. Abortion? Illegitimacy? Keeping the baby? Adoption? Marriage? He must decide what his responsibility is. This film helps teenagers preview the consequences of irresponsible actions, as they affect themselves and others.
